body_html:
So, I did add that line. the CROSSTOOL file has the following cxx_builtin_include_directory entries:

  cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/home/rocha/.local/include"
  cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/lib/gcc/"
  cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/include"
  cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/include"

But there they are:

$ ls /home/rocha/.local/include
zconf.h  zlib.h

body:
So, I did add that line. the CROSSTOOL file has the following `cxx_builtin_include_directory` entries:

```
  cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/home/rocha/.local/include"
  cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/lib/gcc/"
  cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/include"
  cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/include"
```

But there they are:

```
$ ls /home/rocha/.local/include
zconf.h  zlib.h
```
